Sequence Information.Peptide Name: VK12 (histone derived; Lys-rich; UCSS1; natural AMPs; Komodo dragon, lizards; reptiles; animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of THE PEPTIDE shows 94.4% similarity toVK7.Activity: Active against P. aeruginosa  ATCC9027 (EC50 0.7 uM) and S. aureus ATCC 25923 (EC50 0.8 uM). Updated 7/2021; 11/2023
Literature Information.Author: Bishop BM, Juba ML, Russo PS, Devine M, Barksdale SM, Scott S, Settlage R, Michalak P, Gupta K, Vliet K, Schnur JM, van Hoek ML.2017
Literature Information.Title: Discovery of Novel Antimicrobial Peptides from Varanus komodoensis (Komodo dragon) by Large Scale Analyses and De Novo-Assisted Sequencing using Electron Transfer Dissociation Mass Spectrometry
